original_title: Bibleman: Defeating the Shadow of Doubt
overview: While under the spell of the sinister Shadow of Doubt, Kayla begins to doubt God's interests in her problems. And when Bibleman and his trusted friend Coats come to her aid, the cunning Shadow targets Bibleman as his next victim. Both Bibleman and Kayla learn a lesson in relying on the truths in God's Word.
title: Bibleman: Defeating the Shadow of Doubt
